primaryPhoto.description:
Nominated for the WhatsOnStage Awards 2024 for Best West End Show
Crowning glory of the West End, Broadway and beyond SIX is holding court at the Vaudeville Theatre in London. Prepare to Lose Ur Head at ‘the most uplifting piece of new British musical theatre,’ (Evening Standard).
Think you know the six wives of Henry VIII? Think again…
Created by Toby Marlow and Lucy Moss, prepare to experience the Tudor Wives’ lives as they turn back the clock and take to the stage to reclaim their crowns. Hear them retell their stories of love, loss and the infamous ex they all have in common in this Tony Award-winning musical.
Join Aragon, Boleyn, Seymour, Cleves, Howard and Parr in a royal retelling of the sassiest story in British Her-story. Backed by their fiercely all-female band, the Ladies in Waiting, thre’s No Way you want to miss this!
Book your SIX musical tickets and Get Down with LOVEtheatre today!
